mapper.select: SELECT S_ID, S_NAME, S_LOCATION, MANAGER, ATTEMPT_CLASSIFICATION, CITY_COUNTY_CLASSIFICATION, BUSINESS_NUMBER, MANAGER_RESIDENT_NUMBER, POST_CODE, STORE_WIDTH, STORE_HEIGHT FROM SELF_WASH.STORE WHERE S_ID=#{sId}

SELECT A.EQUIPMENT_CODE, A.TPTB, A.EQUIPMENT_STATUS, A.EQUIPMENT_MODEL_ID, (SELECT EQUIPMENT_NAME FROM EQUIPMENT_MODEL B WHERE A.EQUIPMENT_MODEL_ID = B.EQUIPMENT_MODEL_ID) EQUIPMENT_NAME, A.REGULAR_INSPECTION, A.REGULAR_INSPECTION_DATE, A.PURCHASE_PRICE, (SELECT EQUIPMENT_TYPE FROM EQUIPMENT_MODEL B WHERE A.EQUIPMENT_MODEL_ID = B.EQUIPMENT_MODEL_ID) EQUIPMENT_TYPE, A.PURCHASE_DATETIME, A.S_ID, (SELECT S_NAME FROM STORE B WHERE A.S_ID = B.S_ID) S_NAME, C.STORE_EQUIPMENT_ID, C.S_ID, C.EQUIPMENT_CODE, C.X_COORD, C.Y_COORD FROM EQUIPMENT A, STORE_EQUIPMENT_PLACEMENT C WHERE A.S_ID = #{sId} AND A.EQUIPMENT_CODE = C.EQUIPMENT_CODE ORDER BY A.EQUIPMENT_CODE DESC

SELECT WASH_MENU_ID, MENU_PRICE, MENU_NAME, RINSING_CNT, WEIGHT, DEHYDRATION_CNT, A.CATEGORY_ID, WATER_TYPE, `TIME`, MENU_DESC, EQUIPMENT_TYPE FROM SELF_WASH.WASH_MENU A, CATEGORY B WHERE A.CATEGORY_ID = B.CATEGORY_ID AND B.MIDDLE_CATEGORY =#{middleCategory} AND B.LARGE_CATEGORY = #{largeCategory}
SELECT DISTINCT LARGE_CATEGORY , LARGE_CATEGORY_NAME , MIDDLE_CATEGORY , MIDDLE_CATEGORY_NAME FROM CATEGORY WHERE LARGE_CATEGORY = #{largeCategory}
